item.description:
Was it a winter or a long spring?  Summer is not far behind… Yay!  No matter, come to the first wine tasting at Ralph’s house for 2012 in Cheshire.  We want to bid fare thee well to Denise Brown who has been a member and leader in at least these three groups.  She has decided to pull up stakes in CT and move back to CA permanently to be with family and friends on the left coast.  Santa Barbara is calling her back.  We want to send her off in a great wine tasting event.  Don’t know Denise, you may like wine!  Enjoy the night as well with friends and soon to be friends.  The event will be held this March 10th from 6-10pm.  Party Express, Wine and Dine New Haven and Dine out New Haven will all feel the loss.

For wine night, everyone will bring a bottle of wine from CA in honor of Denise (no boxed wine or Yellow Tail please) AND a pot luck dish, finger food, hors d'oeuvres or desert.  Please indicate what food item you want to bring when you sign up.  This invitation will go out to 3 groups of 20 people ea.  Please bring your own expendable glass in case it breaks or you forget it.  I have some, but not enough for all even though I now have some extra Benmarl wine glasses now.

If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $25 or more in multiples of $15 depending on the quantity of people in the group, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste.

Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste testing...

Reds Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir,

whites -

sav blanc, chards, Riesling, pinot grigio, etc.

Please ensure you show up if you RSVP yes, since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a person’s spot if you do not show up.

*Please note* The address will be sent a few days prior to the event if you don't have it already to all the "yes" RSVPs, due to this being a private residence.  It should go without saying to Drink Responsibly.  I will have water and coffee too.

 

Enjoy, responsibly!
